bouquets.name: Sunlit Meadow
bouquets.description: Sunflowers, ranunculus, and chamomile for a bright start to any day.
bouquets.alt: Sunlit Meadow bouquet with sunflowers, ranunculus, and chamomile.

bouquets.name: Blushing Garden
bouquets.description: Garden roses, peonies, and lilac with a soft lavender ribbon.
bouquets.alt: Blushing Garden bouquet featuring garden roses, peonies, and lilac.

bouquets.name: Moonlit Whisper
bouquets.description: White orchids, eucalyptus, and dusty miller in an airy arrangement.
bouquets.alt: Moonlit Whisper bouquet with white orchids, eucalyptus, and dusty miller.

bouquets.name: Heritage Rose Branches
bouquets.description: Select the exact number of long-stemmed heirloom roses you need for your own centerpiece or gifting moment.
bouquets.alt: Single blush rose laying on a table.

variants.label: 1 branch
variants.alt: Single blush rose in a bud vase.

variants.label: 3 branches
variants.alt: Three blush roses wrapped in paper.

variants.label: 5 branches
variants.alt: Five long-stemmed roses resting on fabric.

variants.label: 25 branches
variants.alt: Large bundle of blush roses tied together.

bouquets.name: Lavender Haze
bouquets.description: Fragrant lavender, anemone, and delphinium with airy greenery.
bouquets.alt: Bouquet of lavender, anemone, and delphinium tied together.

bouquets.name: Citrus Bloom
bouquets.description: Citrus-hued ranunculus, tulips, and billy buttons with mint.
bouquets.alt: Vibrant bouquet with orange and yellow blooms on a table.

bouquets.name: Evening Tide
bouquets.description: Deep blue thistle, lisianthus, and fern for an elegant gesture.
bouquets.alt: Moody bouquet in blue tones with fern foliage.

bouquets.name: Wildflower Story
bouquets.description: Loose meadow blooms, nigella, and grasses in a hand-tied bundle.
bouquets.alt: Wildflower bouquet resting on a chair.

services.title: Same-Day Delivery
services.text: Order by 2pm and we will hand deliver your bouquet across the city.

services.title: Weekly/biweekly Subscriptions
services.text: Fresh stems curated for your home, workspace, or lobby every week.

services.title: Custom Events
services.text: From intimate dinners to grand openings, we tailor floral designs for you.

services.title: Occasion Reminder
services.text: Never miss a special occasion with our personalized flower delivery reminders.
